token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['source']="third-partner"
params['sku_ids']="[2195601, 21956033]"
params['category_id']=22410

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.product.open.biz.sku.batchupdate', '1.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
